Things-Ch: 坚尼地城看日落
Things-English: Watch the sun melt into the sea at Kennedy Town.

Things-Ch: 旺角中心、太安楼或葵涌广场扫街吃小吃,
Things-English: Graze your way through Mong Kok Centre, Tai On Building or Kwai Chung Plaza, snacking street by street.

Things-Ch: 乘天星小轮赏维港风景。
Things-English: Cross Victoria Harbour on the Star Ferry and let the skyline glide past you.

Things-Ch: 坐叮叮车到跑马地看全港首间 7-Eleven便利店。
Things-English: Ride the ding-ding to Happy Valley and salute Hong Kong’s very first 7-Eleven.

Things-Ch: 去马场看赛马感受热烈氛围
Things-English: Feel the roar of the crowd and the thunder of hooves at the races.

Things-Ch: 上环、西营盘或大坑散步拍照。
Things-English: Wander and shoot in Sheung Wan, Sai Ying Pun or Tai Hang, where old shopfronts glow in afternoon light.

Things-Ch: 百德新街购买潮牌服饰。
Things-English: Hunt the latest drops on Paterson Street’s fashion strip.

Things-Ch: 中环码头坐渡轮去离岛
Things-English: Board a ferry from Central Pier and watch the city shrink behind you as an island draws near.

Things-Ch: 坐水晶缆车去天坛大佛并参观心经林。
Things-English: Take the crystal cabin to the Big Buddha, then lose yourself in the Heart Sutra bamboo grove.

Things-Ch: 从金钟漫步到铜锣湾，逛星街、月街。
Things-English: Stroll from Admiralty to Causeway Bay, threading Star Street and Moon Street’s quiet boutiques.

Things-Ch: 深水短降暄氨Γ体验贴地生活
Things-English: Treasure-hunt through Sham Shui Po’s thrift dens and back-alley workshops, breathing the city’s salt-of-the-earth air.

Things-Ch: 街市大排档品尝地道风味美食。
Things-English: Pull up a plastic stool at a cooked-food market and taste Hong Kong on a sizzling wok.

Things-Ch: 元朗一日游，打卡B仔凉粉。
Things-English: Spend a day in Yuen Long and cool your tongue with B仔’s famous grass-jelly.

Things-Ch: 西贡看海景，住一晚听海浪声入睡
Things-English: Watch Sai Kung’s jade waters fade to ink, then fall asleep to the hush of waves just outside your window.

Things-Ch: 城门水塘徒步观猴。
Things-English: Hike the monkey-threaded paths of Shing Mun Reservoir and meet the city’s wilder eyes.

Things-Ch: 茶餐厅品尝冻柠茶和港式美食。
Things-English: In a cha chaan teng, let iced lemon tea and Cantonese comfort food reset your clock to Hong Kong time.

Things-Ch: 茶楼饮早茶，吃虾饺、烧卖等点心。
Things-English: Dim-sum morning: bamboo steamers of har-gow, siu-mai and laughter clattering among teacups.

Things-Ch: 大东山看芒草，赏陈奕迅专辑封面同款美景。
Things-English: Climb Sunset Peak’s silver grass fields and stand inside the cover of an Eason Chan album.

Things-Ch: 去香港迪士尼看烟花。
Things-English: End a Disney day with fireworks flowering above Sleeping Beauty Castle.

Things-Ch: 夜晚去中环散步
Things-English: When night folds the city in neon, walk Central’s mid-level escalators and let the lights write stories on your face.

Things-Ch: 文武庙求签感受传统信仰。
Things-English: Draw a fortune slip at Man Mo Temple to feel the pulse of living faith.

Things-Ch: 西环“和昌大押”看百年当铺建筑。
Things-English: Admire the century-old pawnshop architecture of “Wo Cheong Pawn” in Sai Ying Pun.

Things-Ch: 参加粤剧工作坊学唱经典片段。
Things-English: Join a Cantonese-opera workshop and learn to sing a classic aria.

Things-Ch: 用“香港博物馆通行证”打卡多家博物馆
Things-English: Flash the “Hong Kong Museum Pass” and tick off museum after museum.

Things-Ch: M+博物馆看草间弥生南瓜雕塑。
Things-English: Gaze at Yayoi Kusama’s spotted pumpkin in the halls of M+.

Things-Ch: 坐一次落日飞车
Things-English: Take a sunset ride on the “Flying Wheel” as the sky turns to fire.

Things-Ch: 在街头偶遇一次港星。
Things-English: Bump into a Hong Kong star right on the street corner.

Things-Ch: 中环“都爹利街”打卡煤气灯。
Things-English: Step onto Duddell Street to greet the last gas-lit lamps in Central.

Things-Ch: 吃富豪雪糕车的雪糕
Things-English: Queue for a soft-serve from the富豪雪糕车, the city’s roving sweet.

Things-Ch: 兰芳园喝丝袜奶茶搭配菠萝油。
Things-English: At Lan Fong Yuen, let silk-stocking milk tea meet a crisp pineapple bun.

Things-Ch: 深水丁肮和豆品厂”吃现磨豆腐花。
Things-English: In Sham Shui Po, taste just-set soybean pudding at Kung Wo Beancurd Factory.

Things-Ch: 去尖沙咀中港城观景台看日落
Things-English: Watch the sun sink from the China Hong Kong City deck in Tsim Sha Tsui.

Things-Ch: 赤柱市集买手工皮具，美利楼吃下午茶
Things-English: Hunt for hand-stitched leather in Stanley Market, then afternoon-tea beneath Murray House’s colonnades.

Things-Ch: 买一款自己喜欢的礼物
Things-English: Buy yourself a gift that whispers “Hong Kong” every time you see it.

Things-Ch: 麦理浩径第二段徒步露营看星空
Things-English: Camp along Stage 2 of the MacLehose Trail and fall asleep under spilled stars.

Things-Ch: 长洲岛体验“抢包山”节庆活动。
Things-English: On Cheung Chau, chase the Bun-scrambling frenzy of the annual festival.

Things-Ch: 南丫岛游泳后品尝现捞海鲜
Things-English: Swim at Lamma, then feast on seafood hauled from the water minutes ago.

Things-Ch: 大屿山贝澳沙滩露营看日出。
Things-English: Wake on Pui O Beach, Lantau, to watch daybreak climb out of the South China Sea.

Things-Ch: 九龙公园喂锦鲤观雀鸟会。
Things-English: Feed koi and count kingfishers in Kowloon Park’s aviary.

Things-Ch: 看维港的烟花
Things-English: Let Victoria Harbour’s fireworks bloom twice in your eyes.

Things-Ch: 嘉顿山看深水兑咕芭墓屋灯火。
Things-English: From Garden Hill look down on Sham Shui Po’s neon public-housing constellations.

Things-Ch: 西港城逛传统布料市场。
Things-English: Browse bolts of tradition inside the Western Market’s old fabric bazaar.

Things-Ch: 鸭寮街淘二手相机感受怀旧气息"
Things-English: Rummage for vintage cameras on Apliu Street, where time smells of leather and brass.

Things-Ch: 吃香港的麦当劳汉堡、
Things-English: Taste a Hong-Kong-only McDonald’s burger―familiar, yet oddly local.

Things-Ch: Ozone酒吧俯瞰维港夜景喝鸡尾酒
Things-English: Sip a skyline-coloured cocktail at Ozone while the harbour glitters 118 floors below.

Things-Ch: 湾仔“The Pawn”天台酒吧赏跑马地风景。
Things-English: On The Pawn’s rooftop in Wan Chai, let the Happy Valley racecourse unfold like a green fan.

Things-Ch: 中环“终审法院”看古希腊柱廊建筑。
Things-English: Study the Greek-revival colonnade of the Court of Final Appeal in Central.

Things-Ch: 参观“大馆”监狱遗址参加夜间导览。
Things-English: Walk the former prison yard of Tai Kwun at night, history whispering through the bricks.

Things-Ch: 逛香港的夜市
Things-English: Lose yourself in a night market’s lantern-lit labyrinth.

Things-Ch: 参加陶艺工作坊制作茶杯。
Things-English: Shape your own teacup in a pottery studio, palms full of clay and possibility.

Things-Ch: 去香港故宫文化博物馆欣赏文物。
Things-English: Wander the Hong Kong Palace Museum and lock eyes with antiquity.

Things-Ch: 到油街实现看创意艺术展
Things-English: Let oil-street art ignite your imagination at Oil Street.

Things-Ch: 春节期间逛太子花墟买年花。
Things-English: During Lunar New Year, weave through Prince Edward Flower Market and carry spring home in your arms.

Things-Ch: 去香港海洋公园看大熊猫
Things-English: Say hello to the giant pandas at Ocean Park.

Things-Ch: 到香港迪士尼乐园享受欢乐时光
Things-English: Trade adulthood for a day of wonder in Hong Kong Disneyland.

Things-Ch: 乘坐山顶缆车登上太平山顶俯瞰香港
Things-English: Ride the Peak Tram uphill until the city folds into a glittering map below.

Things-Ch: 到西九文化区欣赏街头艺术表演。
Things-English: Catch roaming street artists in the West Kowloon Cultural District.

Things-Ch: 参加香港艺术节感受艺术氛围。
Things-English: Immerse yourself in the city-wide pulse of the Hong Kong Arts Festival.

Things-Ch: 去香港科学馆体验互动展品60.在维多利亚港观看烟花表演。
Things-English: Press every button in the Hong Kong Science Museum.
Watch fireworks stitch gold threads across Victoria Harbour―again, because once is never enough.

Things-Ch: 到尖沙咀钟楼打卡拍照
Things-English: Snap the timeless clocktower at Tsim Sha Tsui waterfront.

Things-Ch: 去香港历史博物馆了解香港历史变迁
Things-English: Let the Hong Kong History Museum narrate a century in one afternoon.

Things-Ch: 漫步星光大道，寻找明星手印。
Things-English: Stroll the Avenue of Stars, palm against palm with your screen idols.

Things-Ch: 到铜锣湾时代广场购物血拼。
Things-English: Shop till your feet sing in Times Square, Causeway Bay.

Things-Ch: 去赤柱海滩晒太阳、踏浪。
Things-English: Sun-bake and wave-chase on Stanley’s curved blonde beach.

Things-Ch: 阅读一份香港的报纸
Things-English: Spread a Hong Kong newspaper and read the city in ink and headlines.

Things-Ch: 到北角春秧街看叮叮车从街市中穿过。
Things-English: Stand on Chun Yeung Street, North Point, as the ding-ding tram threads through the market.

Things-Ch: 去香港大学参观百年建筑。
Things-English: Roam the red-brick century-old campus of the University of Hong Kong.

Things-Ch: 在大澳渔村体验水上人家生活，
Things-English: In Tai O fishing village, taste life on stilts above the tidal creek.

Things-Ch: 到香港湿地公园观鸟赏湿地风光。
Things-English: Bird-watch and breeze-catch in the wetlands of Hong Kong Wetland Park.

Things-Ch: 品尝泰昌饼家的蛋挞。
Things-English: Bite into the still-warm custard crown of Tai Cheong Bakery’s egg tart.

Things-Ch: 去屯门黄金海岸看日落、吹海风。
Things-English: At Golden Beach, Tuen Mun, let sunset and sea-wind rinse the city off you.

Things-Ch: 参加香港美食节品尝各地美食,
Things-English: Graze the globe at the Hong Kong Food Expo.

Things-Ch: 到沙田马场旁的彭福公园散步。
Things-English: Saunter through Penfold Park beside Sha Tin Racecourse, horses thundering in the distance.

Things-Ch: 去元朗锦田看古老围村。
Things-English: Step into the walled villages of Kam Tin, Yuen Long, where clan stories cling to grey brick.

Things-Ch: 在西环泳棚拍摄港风照片。
Things-English: Frame a wind-swept selfie at the Sai Wan Swimming Shed.

Things-Ch: 到香港太空馆探索宇宙奥秘。
Things-English: Travel to the edge of the universe inside the Hong Kong Space Museum.

Things-Ch: 去长洲岛吃糯米糍。
Things-English: On Cheung Chau, sink your teeth into a softball-sized glutinous-rice dumpling.

Things-Ch: 参加香港书展选购心仪书籍,
Things-English: Lose an afternoon (and gain a stack of books) at the Hong Kong Book Fair.

Things-Ch: 到荔枝角公园划船。
Things-English: Paddle a boat across Lai Chi Kok Park’s quiet lake.

Things-Ch: 去黄大仙祠上香祈福
Things-English: Offer incense and a quiet wish at Wong Tai Sin Temple.

Things-Ch: 到油麻地警署感受港片氛围:
Things-English: Pose beneath the pillared fa?ade of Yau Ma Tei Police Station―scene of a thousand film shoots.

Things-Ch: 乘坐复古巴士游香港
Things-English: Tour the city in a heritage double-decker, windows wide to the wind.

Things-Ch: 去荃湾南丰纱厂看创意展览。
Things-English: Explore creative rebirth inside The Mills, Tsuen Wan’s former cotton-spinning giant.

Things-Ch: 在大帽山观赏日出云海。
Things-English: Climb Tai Mo Shan at dawn and stand above a sea of clouds.

Things-Ch: 到葵涌货柜码头看繁忙港口景象
Things-English: Gaze at the choreographed chaos of container ships in Kwai Tsing Port.

Things-Ch: 去石澳健康院打卡电影拍摄地:
Things-English: Visit the Shek O Health Clinic, silver-screen shrine for movie buffs.

Things-Ch: 参加香港龙舟竞渡活动。
Things-English: Feel drumbeats race dragon-boats across the harbour during the Dragon Boat Carnival.

Things-Ch: 到旺角花鸟虫鱼市场逛一逛
Things-English: Wander the bird, flower, cricket and fish market in Mong Kok.

Things-Ch: 去离岛长洲体验渔村生活:
Things-English: Live the slow life on outlying Cheung Chau island.

Things-Ch: 在中环街市品尝各种美食小吃,
Things-English: Graze your way through Central Market’s artisan food stalls.

Things-Ch: 到香港演艺学院观看一场演出。
Things-English: Take your seat at the Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts and let curtains rise on a live show.

Things-Ch: 去流浮山吃海鲜看日落。
Things-English: Feast on oysters and sunset at Lau Fau Shan.

Things-Ch: 参加香港国际七人榄球赛
Things-English: Cheer yourself hoarse at the Hong Kong Sevens rugby tournament.

Things-Ch: 到九龙湾德福广场购物娱乐:
Things-English: Shop, dine and skate beneath the glass vault of Telford Plaza, Kowloon Bay.

Things-Ch: 去香港动植物公园认识动植物。
Things-English: Meet furry and feathered residents of the Hong Kong Zoological and Botanical Gardens.

Things-Ch: 在昂坪 360体验缆车观光。
Things-English: Glide above Lantau in the Ngong Ping 360 crystal cabin.

Things-Ch: 到尖沙咀1881 Heritage看历史建筑与时尚店铺结合。
Things-English: Admire how 1881 Heritage marries colonial grandeur with high fashion.

Things-Ch: 去台湾旅游
Things-English: Fly to Taiwan for a change of passport stamp.

Things-Ch: 在香港街头尝试一次写真摄影
Things-English: Hire a street photographer to freeze you in a frame of Hong Kong light and shadow.
